name: popthebubbles

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/ && cp -r src/assets dist/ && cp src/assets/icons/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc --watch" "nodemon --watch src/index.html --watch src/styles.css --watch src/assets --exec \"cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/ && cp -r src/assets dist/\"" "live-server dist --open=index.html"

author: Malene Ivy Olsen
description: Pop The Bubble er et morsomt nettleserspill laget med TypeScript, der du popper bobler for poeng, men pass deg for de r√∏de boblene!
